El mejor mod de la historia y el juego multijugador más exitoso y longevo de todos los tiempos. Su jugabilidad y precisión es insuperable y muy superior a sus predecesores CS:S y CS:GO. Además, gracias a la comunidad AlliedModders, existe una gran cantidad de mods diferentes de zombies, deathmatch, surf, paintball, gungame, deathrun, furien, HnS, jailbreak, etc... la lista es casi interminable. Counter-Strike es el rey de los shooters, desde 1999 hasta ahora, y ojalá lo siga siendo muchos años más.

Épico, Ele fêz parte da minha infância,conheci ele em mais ou menos em 2004, era no tempo em que a galera ia pra Lan House era o jogo preferido. Comcerteza é o melhor FPS de todos,nemhum vai superar o esse grande épico que é Counter-Strike. Seu gráfico não é um dos melhores mas quem joga intende a grande emoção e diverção que ele apresenta. E por fim,ele  foi o jogo mais competitivo do mundo no cenário do e-Sports nós tempos de 2000 até 2012 e nesses torneios tinhamos uma equipe brasileira nós representando que é mibr (Made in Brazil) 3x consagrado a campeão mundial ESWC 2006,Dreamhack 2007 e ShgOpen 2008. Agradeço a Valve pro esse maravilhoso FPS.

Contras: Bug nas demos.
It's the best starting point of all gamers.

The simple fact that this 10+ years old game still shows up in the top played games on Steam clearly says something about its quality. I feel like I shouldn't even recommend it, as its name speaks for itself. Easy to pick up, difficult to master, Counter-Strike is one, if not the best multiplayer FPS out there, and it'll probably remain that way for many years to come. The fact that this game rivals it sequels in number of players worldwide only shows how great this game is.

So, do yourself a favour and get it.
Legal, e o melhor [e que ainda tem jogadores nos servers.

What can I say, this is a good 'ol game. Servers aren't what they used to be, but if there's ever a time to play, it's now. If your first Counter-Strike game was Global Offensive, it's pretty cool to see how have far the series has come. My personal favorite is CS:S over CS, but this game is still loads of fun. Compared to the glory days, it's a shell of its former self, so play it now before it's too late.

Great FPS game.Yes, it has not the best graphics, but if you want to have a nice aim, уважение 1337 пацанов, nice game collection and etc. you should buy this game.

It doesn't have any achievements, but i gurantee that you will have fun there!

"時を超えたで" 賞 / The "Test of Time" Award  のノミネートのため再レビューとなります。

今から新規の方が遊ぶには辛いと思いますが、僕の中では名作を超えた神ゲー中の神ゲーです。
CS1.6は自分の中でＦＰＳの基礎を作ったソフトであり、最初に熱中したＰＣゲームです。
上記のプレイ時間には記載されてませんが、どのゲームよりも遊んでると思います。
おそらく何千時間は。ＰＣ２台壊してますから。
ＦＰＳの基本に戻りたい時はさりげなく起動していたいソフト。その理由でノミネートに選びました。
他にも面白いソフトはたくさんありますが、これだけは譲れない。

[h1] ★★★★★★[/h1]
Nadal nie wiem czym się strzela, ale można się z ludźmi kłócić.

Эта потрясающая олд скульная игра, времена того самого когда в каждом городе любого района, зайдя в любой компьютерный клуб, люди разных возростов рубились в эту игру, ну и накинем Quake. Говорить об этой можно много, но по факту в ней нет не чего не обычного: бональная механика, геймплей, графика, но это не мешает играть в нее и сейчас. Я решил не обижать и поставть так как было это 10 лет назад и сейчас!

2000-ые: 7.5/10
2014-ый: 3.5/10
